home.title: Our hobby is game development
home.desc: We are a small but close-knit team who love making games and want to share this with others. The most important thing for us is support, having fun together and being creative while learning new knowledge and skills.

priorities.title: Future projects
priorities.desc: Here are the projects we are currently working on!

projects.title: Our projects
projects.desc: Here are the projects we have created and you can already test on your own!

tech.title: Join us
tech.desc1: Join our dynamic community where we create
tech.desc2: projects together and develop our skills.
tech.desc3: Find your place in our team and be part of an inspiring path to success!

about.title: About our group
about.desc: Our entire team is made up of individuals with a passion for gaming! Each of ours is different but we create something amazing together!

error.title: Oops! Something went wrong
error.desc: Octopuses are already working valiantly to rectify this mistake, in the meantime check out what we're up to!
